The entire functionality of `qbanner` is exposed through the chainable methods of the `Banner` struct.

## New Banner

```{rust}

Banner::new(text: impl Into<String>)

```

Creates a new banner builder instance. This is the starting point for all banners.

| Parameter | Type                | Description                             |
|:----------|:--------------------|:----------------------------------------|
| `text`    | `impl Into<String>` | The text content to render as a banner. |

## Set Color

```{rust}

color(self, color: Color) -> Self

```

Sets a single, solid color for the banner text. This overrides any previously set gradient.

| Parameter | Type | Description |
|----|----|----|
| `color` | `Color` | An enum defining the ANSI color (e.g., `Color::Cyan`, `Color::BrightRed`). |

## Set Gradient

```{rust}

gradient(self, colors: Vec<(u8, u8, u8)>) -> Self

```

Sets an RGB color gradient. The color of each line of the banner is interpolated between the colors provided in the vector. This overrides any previously set single color.

| Parameter | Type | Description |
|:---|:---|:---|
| `colors` | `Vec<(u8, u8, u8)>` | A vector of RGB tuples (0-255). Must contain at least two colors for interpolation. |

## Subtitle

```{rust}

subtitle(self, subtitle: impl Into<String>) -> Self

```

Adds a line of text below the main banner. The subtitle inherits the coloring and alignment of the main banner.

## Banner Alignment

```{rust}

alignment(self, alignment: Alignment) -> Self

```

Sets the alignment of the banner within the terminal width.

| Parameter | Type | Options |
|:---|:---|:---|
| `alignment` | `Alignment` | `Alignment::Left`, `Alignment::Center`, `Alignment::Right` |

## Set Font

```{rust}

font(self, font: Font) -> Self`

```

Sets the ASCII art font style. Defaults to `Font::Unicode`.

## Clear Screen

```{rust}

clear_screen(self, clear: bool) -> Self

```

If set to `true` (default), uses an ANSI escape sequence to clear the entire terminal screen before rendering.

## Render

```{rust}
render(&self)
```

**Finalizing Method:** Prints the fully constructed and styled banner directly to standard output (`stdout`).

## Render String

```{rust}
to_string(&self) -> String
```

**Finalizing Method:** Renders the banner but returns the output as a `String` instead of printing it. Useful for logging or saving the output.
